contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 10, 2002 D GBBA Entertainments Contest
GBBA Entertainments Contest (Open) 0 Entertainments Contest GBBA Entertainment Contest gbba-entertainments-contest
Five Acres Theatre, Coleford, Gloucestershire, England, UK Best Soloist, Danny Winder, (Flugel) City of Bristol Scott James (8 years old) Youngest Player Award (City of Bristol Band) First Section - 1. City of Bristol, 2. Lydbrook, 3. Lydmet-Lydney. Second Section - 1. Chalford. Third Section - 1. Ynyshir, 2. Tewkesbury, 3. Portishead. Fourth Section - 1. Ogmore, 2. Pillowell, 3. Phoenix. 14 bands competed.
Nov. 22, 2010, 7:46 p.m. July 8, 2020, 10:26 a.m.
1 City of Bristol Brass Band Bryn James
2 Chalford Band Steve Tubb
3 Lydbrook Band Andrew Culshaw
4 Ynyshir Band Leigh Phillips
5 Lydney Band Bryn James
6 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ivor Barnett
7 Pillowell Silver Band Clive Lewis
